Models

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • Models.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    this model class manages all the maps.

        Returns:

        Returns:

        Throws:

        Returns:

        Throws:
        InvalidMap - pointing out which Country is not connected

      • removeContinent

        public void removeContinent(java.lang.String p_continentName)
                     throws InvalidMap
        Performs the remove continent operation on Map.
        • Deletes Specified Continent
        • Deletes Countries in Continents and their associated data in the Map
        Parameters:
        p_continentName - Continent Name to be found
        Throws:
        InvalidMap - Exception
